title: Great English golf courses
creator_credit: Robert Sidaway, Best of British Films and Television, Ashley Sidaway and Peter Dunn
brief_description: The Royal Birkdale, The Belfry, Woodhall Spa, Wentworth, The Royal St. Georges are magical names to any golfing enthusaist. They are, without doubt, some of the best courses in the world, played by the greatest players. The viewer is given a chance to play along with the players and realise their own golfing dreams.
